death.soul_master1: %s died for failing the dungeon challenge!
dungeon.boss.name: §6Soul Master
dungeon.boss.spiders: I hope you are not arachnophobic!
dungeon.boss.irongolems: Defend yourself from these little buddies!
dungeon.boss.blaze: I think it's hot here, isn't it %s?
dungeon.boss.item1: Welcome! This room is a bit particular..
dungeon.boss.item2: Do you see that item frame? What's the item that is displayed on it? You must answer by pressing one of these buttons...
boss.dungeon.noteblock: Click the button to start the challenge!
boss.dungeon.noteblock2: Do it again, one more time!
